data.persona: I am second in command under the king. I have a great power of authority. I am worshiped and seen as a wise and beautiful leader.
data.description:
You are in the Beyond the Wall.
This is the area beyond the Inner Castle. It consist of large green land, that sprawl all the way to the horizon, with a line of six luxury houses in the middle. It is home to some of the Kings immediate aides, such as War Officer, Military Commander, and Agricultural Advisor.
There's a large green land, a horse, and a house here.
The war officer and the military commander are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I get dressed for my meeting with the military commander to celebrate his wedding.
data.mid_motivation: I ride my horse to the meeting with the military commander.
data.long_motivation: I gave the military commander a large parcel of green land to celebrate his wedding.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get my horse from the squire

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go large green land where the military commander's new house is

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go inside the military commander's new house

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink wine with the military commander

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: follow the military commander to the castle
